metadata.title: CVE-2023-39328 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in OpenJPEG similar to CVE-2019-6988. This flawallows an attacker to bypass existing protections and cause an applicationcrash through a maliciously crafted file.

criterions.comment: openjpeg2 package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebengine-opensource-src package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
blender package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
texmaker package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
